abstract: Peter Diamond, Dale Mortensen and Christopher Pissarides won for work that helps explain mismatches in the employment market.
snippet: Peter Diamond, Dale Mortensen and Christopher Pissarides won for work that helps explain mismatches in the employment market.
lead_paragraph: Peter A. Diamond, a nominee for a Federal Reserve Board position, and two other economists were awarded the 2010 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Science on Monday for their work on markets where buyers and sellers have difficulty finding each other.

headline.main: Economists Share Nobel for Studying Job Market
headline.print_headline: Economists Share Nobel For Studying Job Market
